    deleteUser

    • deleteUser(
          userId: string,
          type?: "app" | "dashboard",
      ): Promise<DeleteUserResponse>

      Delete a user

      Permanently deletes a user and all associated data

      Parameters

      • userId: string

        User ID to delete

      • type: "app" | "dashboard" = 'app'

        User type ('app' or 'dashboard')

      Returns Promise<DeleteUserResponse>

      Deletion confirmation

      Example

      await admin.deleteUser('user-uuid');
      console.log('User deleted');
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:308

    getSetupStatus

    • getSetupStatus(): Promise<AdminSetupStatusResponse>

      Check if initial admin setup is needed

      Returns Promise<AdminSetupStatusResponse>

      Setup status indicating if initial setup is required

      Example

      const status = await admin.getSetupStatus();
      if (status.needs_setup) {
        console.log('Initial setup required');
      }

    inviteUser

    • inviteUser(
          request: InviteUserRequest,
          type?: "app" | "dashboard",
      ): Promise<InviteUserResponse>

      Invite a new user

      Creates a new user and optionally sends an invitation email

      Parameters

      • request: InviteUserRequest

        User invitation details

      • type: "app" | "dashboard" = 'app'

        User type ('app' or 'dashboard')

      Returns Promise<InviteUserResponse>

      Created user and invitation details

      Example

      const response = await admin.inviteUser({
        email: 'newuser@example.com',
        role: 'user',
        send_email: true
      });

      console.log('User invited:', response.user.email);
      console.log('Invitation link:', response.invitation_link);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:285

    listUsers

    • listUsers(options?: ListUsersOptions): Promise<ListUsersResponse>

      List all users

      Parameters

      • options: ListUsersOptions = {}

        Filter and pagination options

      Returns Promise<ListUsersResponse>

      List of users with metadata

      Example

      // List all users
      const { users, total } = await admin.listUsers();

      // List with filters
      const result = await admin.listUsers({
        exclude_admins: true,
        search: 'john',
        limit: 50,
        type: 'app'
      });
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:242

    login

    • login(request: AdminLoginRequest): Promise<AdminAuthResponse>

      Admin login

      Authenticate as an admin user

      Parameters

      • request: AdminLoginRequest

      Returns Promise<AdminAuthResponse>

      Authentication response with tokens

      Example

      const response = await admin.login({
        email: 'admin@example.com',
        password: 'password123'
      });

      // Token is automatically set in the client
      console.log('Logged in as:', response.user.email);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:158

    logout

    • logout(): Promise<void>

      Admin logout

      Invalidates the current admin session

      Returns Promise<void>

      Example

      await admin.logout();
      localStorage.removeItem('admin_token');
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:197

    me

    • me(): Promise<AdminMeResponse>

      Get current admin user information

      Returns Promise<AdminMeResponse>

      Current admin user details

      Example

      const { user } = await admin.me();
      console.log('Logged in as:', user.email);
      console.log('Role:', user.role);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:214

    refreshToken

    • refreshToken(request: AdminRefreshRequest): Promise<AdminRefreshResponse>

      Refresh admin access token

      Parameters

      • request: AdminRefreshRequest

      Returns Promise<AdminRefreshResponse>

      New access and refresh tokens

      Example

      const refreshToken = localStorage.getItem('admin_refresh_token');
      const response = await admin.refreshToken({ refresh_token: refreshToken });

      // Update stored tokens
      localStorage.setItem('admin_token', response.access_token);
      localStorage.setItem('admin_refresh_token', response.refresh_token);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:180

    resetUserPassword

    • resetUserPassword(
          userId: string,
          type?: "app" | "dashboard",
      ): Promise<ResetUserPasswordResponse>

      Reset user password

      Generates a new password for the user and optionally sends it via email

      Parameters

      • userId: string

        User ID

      • type: "app" | "dashboard" = 'app'

        User type ('app' or 'dashboard')

      Returns Promise<ResetUserPasswordResponse>

      Reset confirmation message

      Example

      const response = await admin.resetUserPassword('user-uuid');
      console.log(response.message);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:353

    setup

    • setup(request: AdminSetupRequest): Promise<AdminAuthResponse>

      Perform initial admin setup

      Creates the first admin user and completes initial setup. This endpoint can only be called once.

      Parameters

      • request: AdminSetupRequest

      Returns Promise<AdminAuthResponse>

      Authentication response with tokens

      Example

      const response = await admin.setup({
        email: 'admin@example.com',
        password: 'SecurePassword123!',
        name: 'Admin User'
      });

      // Store tokens
      localStorage.setItem('admin_token', response.access_token);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:132

    updateUserRole

    • updateUserRole(
          userId: string,
          role: string,
          type?: "app" | "dashboard",
      ): Promise<EnrichedUser>

      Update user role

      Changes a user's role

      Parameters

      • userId: string

        User ID

      • role: string

        New role

      • type: "app" | "dashboard" = 'app'

        User type ('app' or 'dashboard')

      Returns Promise<EnrichedUser>

      Updated user

      Example

      const user = await admin.updateUserRole('user-uuid', 'admin');
      console.log('User role updated:', user.role);
      • Defined in src/admin.ts:329
